statements: UPDATE intellectual_property_documents SET document_name = 'Updated Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE intellectual_property_documents SET document_type = 'Updated Type', document_name = 'New Name' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE intellectual_property_documents SET document_name = 'Patent Application' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE intellectual_property_documents SET document_type = 'Trademark' , document_content = E'\x48656C6C6F20576F726C64' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE patent_drawings SET description = 'New Description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE copyright_certificates SET file_type = 'PDF' WHERE copyright_holder = 'John Doe';
UPDATE patent_drawings SET title = 'New Drawing Title', description = 'Updated Description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE copyright_certificates SET copyright_holder = 'New Copyright Holder', file_type = 'PDF' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE images SET name = 'New Image Name' WHERE id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
UPDATE intellectual_property SET owner = 'New Owner' , name = 'New Name' WHERE id = '87654321-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
UPDATE images SET name='New Image Name', image_data=X'010203040506' WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE intellectual_property SET owner='New Owner', date_created='2022-01-01' WHERE name='Intellectual Property X';
UPDATE patents SET patent_title='New Patent Title', patent_description='New Patent Description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE patent_images SET image_description='Updated Image Description', image_url='https://example.com/image.jpg' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE patents SET patent_title = 'New Patent Title', inventor = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE copyrights SET certificate_name = 'Updated Certificate Name', registration_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE patents SET description='Updated Description', title='New Title' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE inventors SET country='USA' WHERE name='John Doe';
UPDATE patents SET title='Improved Patent Title', description='New and improved description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE inventors SET country='United States', name='John Doe' WHERE id=5;
